name: Millennium College of Aviation Studies (MCAS)
about: Millennium College of Aviation Studies (MCAS) is the first and only premier aviation college in Sri Lanka, offering a wide range of aviation programs. MCAS provides an Aviation Degree with pathways to masterâ€™s levels, in collaboration with academic partners like Lincoln University College, Malaysia, and OTHM, UK. Recognized by the Tertiary and Vocational Education Commission (TVEC) of Sri Lanka, MCAS ensures international recognition and validity of its qualifications. The curriculum combines theoretical knowledge with practical flight training, covering subjects such as meteorology, air law, navigation, and aircraft technical knowledge. With faculty members having over 40 years of industry experience, MCAS nurtures students to become proficient aviation professionals, preparing them for successful careers in the aviation industry. MCAS is committed to taking aviation education to greater heights.
